summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: A multidisciplinary software architect with over 20 years of experience, specializing in creating 'intelligent digital brains' instead of simple websites. My philosophy is to merge deep systems engineering with a strategic product vision and a passion for UX to build scalable, resilient, and high-performance digital assets that drive measurable business results. I don't build sites; I build sovereign ecosystems designed to grow.

duties: Design and development of software architectures based on monorepos (Nx) for complex projects.
Implementation of sovereign Headless CMS and GraphQL APIs with Apollo Server, NestJS, and Sequelize.
Creation of high-performance Progressive Web Apps (PWA) with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Development of 'LIA Legacy', an orchestrating AI co-pilot to accelerate the software development lifecycle.
Led development teams on large-scale projects for the finance, retail, and media sectors.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL databases, achieving performance improvements of up to 300%.
Implemented Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, reducing time-to-market by 50%.
Mentored and trained developers, improving code quality and team productivity.

call_to_action.title: Let's Build Together
call_to_action.content: My passion is to transform ambitious visions into digital reality. If you have a project in mind or are looking for a strategic partner to take your platform to the next level, I would love to hear your vision and explore if we can create quality software together that endures and scales.
